column1: Little Goat Diner////We got here around noon on a Friday for brunch and there was about a 30 minute wait for inside seating (they also had outdoor patio seating).  Instead of waiting
column2: we decided to sit at the "Bread Bar" which is in the back of the restaurant.  The bartenders were super friendly
column4: and very knowledgeable about the menu.  They helped us navigate the menu and even recommended some their favorite dishes.
